description: Make this roasted sweet potato salad with quinoa, chickpeas and dukkah to serve at your next barbecue. The whole family will love this colourful side.
name: Roasted Pumpkin With Kale Pesto Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.66 cup Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
2 tbs lemon & herb dukkah with almonds

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer pumpkin to a serving board or platter. Serve drizzled with kale pesto and sprinkled dukkah.
